p: The developed method was fully validated. The calibration curve, limits of detection (LOD), limits of quantification (LOQ), and the linear range for each analyte are provided in Table 1. All compounds showed good linearity (r 2 ≥ 0.9993) within the tested ranges. The repeatability was expressed as the relative standard deviation (%RSD) of the major constituents’ content and the RSD ranged from 0.3% to 1.3%, which was satisfactory. The determination of the main compounds in the tested solutions was done by comparing the peaks retention times and the UV-spectrum obtained from the chromatogram of the standard solution ( Table 2 and Table S1). All results revealed repeatability, accuracy, high sensitivity and good linearity of the method.
